C72WkcUZvco.description: Create a simple HTML page with a heading and paragraph.

starterCode.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>My First Web Page</title>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Write your code here -->
</body>
</html>
starterCode.python:
print('<!DOCTYPE html>')
print('<html>')
print('<head>')
print('    <title>My First Web Page</title>')
print('</head>')
print('<body>')
print('    <!-- Write your code here -->')
print('</body>')
print('</html>')

R_gFhRsWLMw.description: Create a styled web page using HTML and CSS.

starterCode.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Styled Web Page</title>
    <style>
        /* Write your CSS here */
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Write your HTML here -->
</body>
</html>
starterCode.python:
print('<!DOCTYPE html>')
print('<html>')
print('<head>')
print('    <title>Styled Web Page</title>')
print('    <style>')
print('        /* Write your CSS here */')
print('    </style>')
print('</head>')
print('<body>')
print('    <!-- Write your HTML here -->')
print('</body>')
print('</html>')
